alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 8:29PM MDT until June 01 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Daniels County in northeastern Montana... Northeastern Valley County in northeastern Montana... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 829 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles south of Richland, or 21 miles southeast of Opheim, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Larslan. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
